titleStmt.title: Rule a vvife and have a wife A comoedy. Acted by His Majesties Servants. Written by John Fletcher Gent.
titleStmt.author: Fletcher, John, 1579-1625.
Cervantes Saavedra, Miguel de, 1547-1616. Casamiento engañoso.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Leonard Lichfield printer to the University,

notesStmt.note: The minor plot is from "El casamiento engañoso" by Cervantes.
The title page is partly in the same setting as Fletcher's "The tragœdy of Rollo duke of Normandy", 1640.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
